shows.title: WG1: Welcome to Wicked Grounds with Siouxsie Q
shows.subtitle: Our first podcast
shows.summary: In our first episode, Ryan and Roo describe the history of the cafe and speak with special guest Siouxsie Q about some of her favorite things.

shows.title: WG2: Siouxie Q Part 2
shows.subtitle: Siouxie Q and questions from the world.
shows.summary: In this episode, Roo and Ryan talk to Siouxie about Food, ElfQuest, Virginity, Theater, and take questions from the audience.
